attributes.title: the app is a no for me ☺️
attributes.review: i bought the app to be aware of all the events happening but opened it to a cheeto man on my screen and it made me so nauseous i kept throwing up for about 10 mins then my mom texted me to see how i was doing and when i opened my phone to text her i saw the cheeto man again and made me throw up more 🤢🤮what made the cheeto man more nauseating was that he thought blond wig was his color i think he needs to embrace his cheeto side and just ask his hair stylus to make him an orange wig so he can be a walking cheeto and the blonde wig obviously thinks the same thing because it keeps trying to get away from his head 😌😌😁

attributes.title: Hot garbage
attributes.review: I have to say, I was appalled by this app. Who lets a monkey with two twiddling thumbs have their own app?!?! I thought it was going to be a fun game where I could feed the developed nation with leading maternal mortality rates into even more crippling obesity by stuffing it with happy meals. come to find, it’s actually a form of rash propaganda meant to brainwash said country. this app is absolutely terrible, just like America’s President

attributes.title: I’m now grounded because of this app
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app to find out it sent out a bomb to my house and I had 10 mins to defuse the bomb but because I’m a ninja and a brown belt I did a back flip over my house and cut the blue wire and stoped the bomb but I was so focused on the bomb I found out I activated 30 more Bombs and killed 42 people because of it and now I’m grounded for a week because of you 😡

attributes.title: genuinely horrifying🤢🤮
attributes.review: decided to pop into the app store and download this horrible mess of an app so that i could support our cheeto president😌WELL i was smacked in the face with disappointment the minute i opened this app☹️not at all what i wanted nor was i expecting, the unhappiness that i experienced has caused me to go into emotional shocK😭very heartbreaking, this app should be removed from the app store IMMEDIATELY‼️‼️

attributes.title: Worst app ever😔🤮

DO NOT and I will repeat🤬 DO NOT get this horrible, disrespectful😣, disgusting😠APP RATE IT A 1 STAR✨and get it taken down💆🏽‍♂️.

I downloaded this app and it asked me to send me notifications 😭
The thing that it doesnt know , is that someone already asked me..Yes, I am engaged with someone, my fiance almost left me because of this 😩 If you want to keep your relationship safe 👁👅👁 DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP 😑 This app also had the AUDACITY to ask MY PHONE NUMBER ✨🧚🏾‍♂️ Like who do you think i am, i already TOLD YOU that I WAS ENGAGED 😌
I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP ✨🙄
#TIKTOKLIVEMATTER #TLM 👁👄👁

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.review: This app is NOT the real Donald Trump app. Upon downloading, I was hacked with thousands of viruses which made it IMPOSSIBLE for me to access my phone. I am incredibly upset because not only did the Trump administration hack my bank account and drain the funds, they texted my mom and told her that I had an STD! Which is completely untrue! I am beyond disgusted with this app. Don’t make the same mistake as I did!
